definition: practical/corresponding to reality/geared to practical situations
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Numerical results showed that the algorithm was efficient and the model was more suitable to the engineering facts.
sentences.chinese: 通過一算例求解結果表明算法可行，模型更切合實際。

sentences.english: Finally, the design should cope with as many situations as practical, and certainly all those normally expected.
sentences.chinese: 最後，設計應當切合實際的各種情況，考慮完整性。

sentences.english: Your plan fell down when it proved too costly.
sentences.chinese: 你的計劃是不切合實際的，因爲它被證實耗資太大。

sentences.english: Any comparison that is not strictly factual runs the risk of being interpreted as subjective.
sentences.chinese: 任何不完全切合實際的比較都有可能被當作主觀臆斷。

sentences.english: Have a realistic exercise work out and take one step at a time.
sentences.chinese: 制定一個切合實際的運動計劃並按時逐步實行。

sentences.english: One of my jobs is to try to make those more realistic.
sentences.chinese: 我的工作之一是使這些模型更切合實際。

sentences.english: In the Dhamma, there is nothing that is impractical or irrational.
sentences.chinese: 佛法中也沒有不切合實際或不理性的東西。

sentences.english: They're neither being biblical nor practical in helping that couple.
sentences.chinese: 在幫助他們時，他們既不遵循聖經也不切合實際。

sentences.english: This approach is certainly not practical when schedule and cost constraints are prohibitive of such an effort.
sentences.chinese: 受時間和成本的限制，這顯然是不切合實際的。

sentences.english: Let'sadd highlight and shadow to make it more realistic.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們添加高光和陰影，使之更加切合實際。

sentences.english: Like all new habits, it’s best to set realistic expectations.
sentences.chinese: 像所有新的習慣一樣，最好設定切合實際的期望。

sentences.english: It is not practical to spend all your money.
sentences.chinese: 把你的錢全花掉是不切合實際的。

sentences.english: Aristotelian science was based on a very common sensible idea.
sentences.chinese: 亞里士多德學科基於一個非常切合實際的想法。

sentences.english: Her ideas to the boutique are always very down-to-earth.
sentences.chinese: 她對於這個精品店的設想總是很切合實際。
